body.name: ONN 24-Inch Class HD (720P) LED Smart TV + Free Wall Mount with Wi-Fi Connectivity and Mobile App | Flat Screen TV Compatible with Apple Home Kit | Alexa and Google Assistant (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 15 hrs 36 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Roku TV, America’s #1 Streaming platform – Cord Cutters can stream 350+ free live TV channels, 1,000’s of Streaming Apps, hit Movies & TV, Music, and Premium channels. Access one of the broadest selections of streaming apps like Netflix, Prime Video, MAX, Apple TV+, Disney+, ESPN+, Hulu, Fox Sports, YouTube TV, Pluto TV, Peacock, NFL for entertainment your way.
Free Wall Mount Lutema: Enjoy a better view and angle from your living room or bedroom by mounting your TV on the wall, giving it a unique look and saving space with the wall mount
Works with Alexa & Google Assistant -Ask Google Assistant or Alexa to turn on your TV, change channels, control volume and more

60hz Refresh Rate - Smooth motion while gaming or watching sports. A Perfect Fit for your Smart Home – Pair your Roku LED TV to Find and Play entertainment, control streaming, turn on the TV and more with Siri, Alexa or Hey Google. Compatible with Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant-enabled, and Apple HomeKit devices.
Connections: 3 HDMI, 1 composite, 1 USB, 1 optical, 1 coaxial/cable and 1 headphone
body.description: The 24-inch Onn Smart TV is a high-quality device that provides an exceptional entertainment experience. With its 24-inch LED screen, this television offers a clear and detailed image with a resolution of 720p. Its sleek and slim design fits seamlessly into any space in the home, while its quick and easy setup ensures a smooth and comfortable user experience. The built-in speakers provide crisp, clear sound, further enhancing the viewing experience. In addition, the Onn 24-inch television has a wide variety of input ports, including HDMI and USB, allowing the connection of various devices. With this television, you can enjoy your favorite TV shows, movies and games in exceptional quality. If you are looking for a high-quality television that provides an immersive viewing experience, the 24-inch Onn Smart TV is an excellent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Roku TV for the price, exceptionally good reception and picture and sound
reviews.reviewText: I have two onn. Roku TVs in my home, a 40" and now a 32", both work so so well, very happy with both, excellent price, easy set up, great reception and both TVs pick up wifi instantly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Arrived broken but they redeemed themselves
reviews.reviewText: It seems like a common problem that the larger tvs arrive broken quite often. I have ordered a replacement and will give an update with that one but be warned if you’re ordering a tv bigger than 32 inches it seems like there’s a good chance it will arrive damagedUpdate:We just received our new 50 inch in perfect condition. It was packaged much more securely this time. The picture quality is great and the sound was better than expected. Though we’re still going to be using a sound bar. I would say the biggest downside is the wall mount. The plastic anchors feel cheap and break easily so you’ll either need to get different drywall anchors or find the studs to install the mount into.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wall mount is worthless
reviews.reviewText: The screws need to be pretty big to not fall through the clips you're supposed to screw onto the tv. But they have to be incredibly tiny to screw into the TV. So either the screws work for the clips you're supposed to screw into the TV but not the TV itself, or they work for the TV but not the clips you're meant to screw into the TV. If screws the right size for this product exist they were not provided by the seller. And if you're not getting what you need to actually use the product then you are just wasting your money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality use it in my office. We only stream tv so it’s nice not to have an additional box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It does the job but not quite right
reviews.reviewText: The TV itself works fine. Nothing fancy. It's a refurbished unit that came with a free mount. It's seamless setup as you would expect by now from TV manufacturers.The mount that was free does not fit the TV. I purchased this "bundle" for a small TV option for the kitchen. The mount for the TV will not install due to the included bolts being too big. The hardware that is included with the TV for the legs will not fit as a replacement for the mount hardware (otherwise the included TV legs work fine).If you buy this TV for the TV, and nothing else, easy 4 stars. The wall mount issue deducts a star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for semi truck
reviews.reviewText: Due to the rough roads the mounting area doesn't last long and breaks. Would be nice if they could make that area thicker or stronger. 4th TV I have bought all with the same problem. Just not sturdy enough.
La compré con un súper descuentazo y la verdad está muy bien la pantalla, funciona bien y sin problemas 🥰 me encantó
Excelente producto. Nos llegó estrellada, pedí reemplazo y estoy muy contenta. Seguido me indica que no hay conexión a wifi, compruebo y se conecta, desconozco si sea problema de la tv o de mi red
Esta super. Se ve super bien 👍 excelente calidad
Por el precio que pague está increíble

reviews.reviewTitle: Es la 2a. Pantalla que compró la 1a. Sin problemas la 2a.deve ser mejor si recomiendo
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta mucho ahora la tecnología es diferente yo vi tele de bulbos en blanco y negro ahora es por Internet mucha diferencia en 60años
